fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: With the exclusion of those playing a hybrid build focusing on Physical and Pyro damage or with her C6 (Increases Attack), Energy Recharge and Elemental Mastery can be ignored as well as her burst and skill.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Amber | Update Date: 01/25/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: Amos' Bow

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Thundering Pulse, Sharpshooter’s Oath, Prototype Crescent, Hamayumi, Blackcliff Warbow, Hunter's Path

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: x2-attack|x2-crimsonwitchofflames

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: CRIT DMG|ATK%|Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)**Normal Attack: Sharpshooter
**2)** Elemental Skill: Explosive Puppet
**3)** Elemental Burst: Fiery Rain

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
The most important part of this playstyle is to make up for the low scalings on her charged shot by building up high CRIT DMG and consistently landing headshots (weak-point hits) for guaranteed CRIT hit. 

*If playing against enemies with no weak-points or World Bosses, CRIT Rate weapons can be better for balancing your CRIT ratio.*

Elemental Mastery sands is conditionally better, but she must be in a Melt or Vaporize team.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Amber | Update Date: 01/25/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: The Stringless

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Windblume Ode, Raven Bow, Elegy for the End

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value: Talents do not have to be leveled for this build, as her raw Pyro damage is negligible.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
It's not recommended to farm Crimson Witch of Flames for just Burgeon Amber.
2-piece mixes of any Elemental Mastery +80 sets work too.
